mean_en: a group of people who have been elected to meet together regularly and make decisions or laws for a particular region or country
sentence: I delivered a speech to the assembly of union members.
sentence_trans: 我在工会会员大会上做了演讲。
word_etyma: as不断 + sembl \u003dsame一样 + y表名词 → 不断到一个地方→ assembly集合
